summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4512 for the improvement of Harvard Avenue North, from East Boston Street to Shelby Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by the construction of watermains, repaving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 52908, as several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
